attributes.action: change everyone's rights to go to the toilets allowable whenever they ask
attributes.additional_details: I would like this to happen because people cannot concentrate on their learning when their desperate to go to the toilet.  I personally think this is highly unfair.
attributes.background: I would like the government to change all schools rules to allow all students to go to the toilet immediately when they ask too.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
